plot: Johnny is in jail when he is visited by his estranged lover Rita. Rita goads Johnny into remembering a secret buried deep in his subconscious.
title: The Pretty Lie
plot_es: Johnny is in jail when he is visited by his estranged lover Rita. Rita goads Johnny into remembering a secret buried deep in his subconscious.
plot_en: Johnny is in jail when he is visited by his estranged lover Rita. Rita goads Johnny into remembering a secret buried deep in his subconscious.
